name: qazandoshop
description: Projeto de automação E2E com Cypress - QazandoShop

scripts.report:generate: marge cypress/reports/merged-report.json --reportDir cypress/reports --inline --reportTitle "QazandoShop - Testes Automatizados" --reportPageTitle "Relatório de Testes - Thayse Maria Dias Fonseca" --charts true --showHooks always --code true
scripts.report:full: npm run report:clean && npm run report && npm run report:merge && npm run report:generate && npm run report:open
scripts.clean: npm run report:clean && rm -rf cypress/screenshots/ cypress/videos/ || del /s /q cypress\screenshots\ cypress\videos\
scripts.test:clean: npm run clean && npm run test

author: Thayse Maria Dias Fonseca
